entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody's normal eye was bulging, and he looked completely insane now, towering over Harry, leering down at him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The door was barred, and Ha rry knew he would never reach his own wand in time.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: Moody said 'The Dark Lord and I,' indicating that the Dark Lord is a significant entity.

entities.name: moody's magical eye
entities.description: The magical eye fixed upon Harry.

relationships.description: Moody said 'The Dark Lord and I,' indicating that the Dark Lord is a significant entity targeting Harry.
Moody said 'The Dark Lord and I,' indicating that Moody is affiliated with the Dark Lord.
